header.title: olá mundo!
header.subtitle: , a software engineer based in Vancouver /Canada. I am passionate about building good looking interfaces, web apps, and everything in between!
header.text1: Hello world! I am a Software Engineer based in Vancouver /Canada. I received my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from the Federal University of Catalão in 2022. For the past 4 years I have been working as a developer and I have experience with a wide range of technologies. You can find a list of my technical skills below.
header.text2: I am passionate about building web applications that are fast, responsive and accessible. I am also a fan of open source software and I am always looking for new ways to contribute to the community.

projects.title: Snack Delivery App
projects.description: With the Snack App, you can easily browse through a variety of restaurants and cuisines, place your order, and have your favorite dishes delivered straight to your home or office.

projects.title: NASIR EXPERIENCE APP
projects.description: This Feedback app is a tool designed to streamline the feedback collection process in a hospital with its intuitive user interface and seamless cross-platform functionality. It allows patients to provide feedback on their experience at the hospital, which can then be used by hospital staff to improve the quality of care provided to patients. Two Apps were developed, one for the patient and another for the hospital administration.

projects.title: Catering Website
projects.description: The Catering Website is an exciting online plataform that helps people visualize the services offered by the catering company in just one place. With a focus on simplicity and functionality, this website feature intuitive navigation, allowing users to easily browse through a wide range of catering options, explore menus, and request personalized quotes.
